attributes.action: Make it law that a Pandemic is the responsibility of the UK government.
attributes.additional_details: The UK nations are uniquely intertwined and the Covid 19 pandemic has proven that the devolved governments cannot work together.  Political point scoring seems to be more important than people.  The confusion that this spreads amongst the population is unacceptable.
attributes.background: Pandemics are difficult to manage and should be the responsibility of the UK government.  Bring control of pandemics into law so that the UK government has sole responsibility for the management of any pandemic.

rejection.details: We're not sure exactly what things you'd like the UK Government, rather than devolved administrations, to be responsible for. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what powers you'd like to be returned to the UK Government.
